channel.title: Realm Onwards - But with a twist... - Delta Version - Update: 2/? of Tutorial!
channel.description:
[center] [size=24pt]Click[/size] [size=20pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533631.0.html]here[/url][/size] for the [size=18pt]PI[/size] version.
[size=36pt] Realm Onwards But with a twist... Delta Version
[URL=http://img268.imageshack.us/i/89501017.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/205/89501017.png[/img][/URL] [/size]
[URL=http://img839.imageshack.us/i/52195194.png/][IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/301/52195194.png[/img][/URL][/center]
Today, I am back to [size=24pt]Realm Onwards[/size], however, I've added a [size=22pt]twist[/size] to the server. This one is [size=20pt]still[/size] for [size=18pt]newcomers[/size] (Since that's the goal for Realm Onwards). However, this server [size=16pt]emphasizes unique quality to servers[/size]. By this I mean
[6:27:19 PM] Arham Siddiqui: In order to have a unique server, [size=14pt]one must jot down unique ideas and collide it like a collage[/size] [6:27:29 PM] Arham Siddiqui: and make [size=14pt]uniqueness and originallity[/size] attributes for the [size=14pt]spaz[/size]
Some more advice would be
[6:07:38 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Why not add the earthquake scene at the beginning of the server. [6:07:44 PM] Arham Siddiqui: And from that, players learn stuff. [6:08:16 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Like, What's happening? Some guy: Come with me, you need to learn the basics of this land before coming here. *Start tutorial island quest* [6:09:55 PM] Sir Pattalot: Well the storyline already has something like this [6:10:00 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Ooo [6:10:11 PM] Sir Pattalot: and something a bit more realistic than some random guy telling you you need to learn stuff [6:10:19 PM] Sir Pattalot: Basically [6:10:32 PM] Sir Pattalot: At the start your task is to break into a kingdoms armory [6:10:48 PM] Sir Pattalot: You have to sneak around the dungeons and do tasks which reflect the in game skills [6:10:55 PM] Sir Pattalot: And then you get caught [6:11:02 PM] Arham Siddiqui: O.o [6:11:36 PM] Sir Pattalot: The guy who catches you is going to kill you until the king says he needs all the men he can get to win the war [6:11:58 PM] Sir Pattalot: SO basically you start off as a criminal [6:12:02 PM] Sir Pattalot: And then you work your way up through the storyline [6:13:29 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But then it's a mandatory storyline [6:13:34 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Not an optional storyline [6:13:49 PM] Arham Siddiqui: You have to make it optional [6:13:58 PM] Arham Siddiqui: It's a mandatory thing for unique servers. [6:14:40 PM] Sir Pattalot: You can skip it [6:14:48 PM] Sir Pattalot: There will be an option at the start [6:15:07 PM] Sir Pattalot: And if you don't want to do it, you will be found straight away and sent to the jail cell [6:15:15 PM] Sir Pattalot: As opposed to the end of the tutorial [6:15:35 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Now that's what I don't like actually. [6:16:03 PM] Sir Pattalot: Whats wrong with that system though? [6:16:16 PM] Sir Pattalot: Only if you've already put a character through there can you skip it [6:16:30 PM] Sir Pattalot: If its your first account you have to do the tutorial [6:18:47 PM] Sir Pattalot: It wont be like that [6:21:32 PM] Sir Pattalot: But why would some random just come and say [6:21:44 PM] Sir Pattalot: Come you need to know the laws of the land before you come [6:22:40 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Well, our character doesn't know who the heck Sir Amak Varze is until they start Black Knights' Fortress [6:23:00 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Who the heck is this injured man when they start RS [6:23:12 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Who the heck was The Runescape Guide in old rs [6:23:26 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But the player later understands who they are [6:23:28 PM] Arham Siddiqui: there purpose [6:23:31 PM] Arham Siddiqui: about there life [b][6:24:37 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But in my aspect, it's still [size=14pt]originality[/size]. [6:24:46 PM] Arham Siddiqui: It's [size=14pt]not[/size] making the game a whole new game [6:25:13 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Its [size=14pt]keeping point of views[/size] of the [size=14pt]past[/size] game, but [size=14pt]implement[/size] [size=14pt]future[/size] tenses for [size=14pt]fun and uniqueness[/size][/b]
Whatever that is [b]bold[/b] are the key aspects of this server.
I believe this is all that is needed to understand.
MEDIA
[hr]
[b][size=36pt]The Glory Hog (AKA New Update)[/size][/b]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gUkh0GqJeQM
[hr]
[b][size=36pt]Other Updates[/size][/b]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kDoCs9abtSo
[hr]
The base will be Project Zeta. Why? Because this emphasizes using beginner bases and stepping on to more advance programming as you move on. Unlike let's say XenoRune.
[b]Delta_:[/b] For Delta. [b]Moparscape:[/b] Awesome forums! [b]Arham 4:[/b] Adding things to server [b]Project Zeta:[/b] An amazing base.

item.title: Realm Onwards - But with a twist... - Delta Version - Update: 2/? of Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

hadlich4:

do you need a modeler? im really wanting to join in on a project look at some of my recent post in model section theres pictures of some of my models

This is not a server for play. It’s a release.

Read full topic

I_Hybrid_I:

Do you want me to be your Graphic Designer?

Nah, it’s not a server for public so it doesn’t matter

EDIT: Some people have gotten the wrong meaning of ‘The Glory Hog’. ‘The Glory Hog’ Simply means New Update.

item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[[6:24:37 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But in my aspect, it’s still originality.
[6:24:46 PM] Arham Siddiqui: It’s not making the game a whole new game
[6:25:13 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Its keeping point of views of the past game, but implement future tenses for fun and uniqueness

Luuuucy! You’ve got some 'splainin to doooooo!

Read full topic

item.title: Realm Onwards - But with a twist... - Delta Version - Update: 2/? of Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center]
[size=24pt]Click[/size] [size=20pt]here[/size] for the [size=18pt]PI[/size] version.

[size=36pt]
Realm Onwards
But with a twist…
Delta Version


[/size]

[/center]

Today, I am back to [size=24pt]Realm Onwards[/size], however, I’ve added a [size=22pt]twist[/size] to the server. This one is [size=20pt]still[/size] for [size=18pt]newcomers[/size] (Since that’s the goal for Realm Onwards). However, this server [size=16pt]emphasizes unique quality to servers[/size]. By this I mean

[6:27:19 PM] Arham Siddiqui: In order to have a unique server, [size=14pt]one must jot down unique ideas and collide it like a collage[/size]
[6:27:29 PM] Arham Siddiqui: and make [size=14pt]uniqueness and originallity[/size] attributes for the [size=14pt]spaz[/size]

Some more advice would be

[6:07:38 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Why not add the earthquake scene at the beginning of the server.
[6:07:44 PM] Arham Siddiqui: And from that, players learn stuff.
[6:08:16 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Like, What’s happening? Some guy: Come with me, you need to learn the basics of this land before coming here. Start tutorial island quest
[6:09:55 PM] Sir Pattalot: Well the storyline already has something like this
[6:10:00 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Ooo
[6:10:11 PM] Sir Pattalot: and something a bit more realistic than some random guy telling you you need to learn stuff
[6:10:19 PM] Sir Pattalot: Basically
[6:10:32 PM] Sir Pattalot: At the start your task is to break into a kingdoms armory
[6:10:48 PM] Sir Pattalot: You have to sneak around the dungeons and do tasks which reflect the in game skills
[6:10:55 PM] Sir Pattalot: And then you get caught
[6:11:02 PM] Arham Siddiqui: O.o
[6:11:36 PM] Sir Pattalot: The guy who catches you is going to kill you until the king says he needs all the men he can get to win the war
[6:11:58 PM] Sir Pattalot: SO basically you start off as a criminal
[6:12:02 PM] Sir Pattalot: And then you work your way up through the storyline
[6:13:29 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But then it’s a mandatory storyline
[6:13:34 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Not an optional storyline
[6:13:49 PM] Arham Siddiqui: You have to make it optional
[6:13:58 PM] Arham Siddiqui: It’s a mandatory thing for unique servers.
[6:14:40 PM] Sir Pattalot: You can skip it
[6:14:48 PM] Sir Pattalot: There will be an option at the start
[6:15:07 PM] Sir Pattalot: And if you don’t want to do it, you will be found straight away and sent to the jail cell
[6:15:15 PM] Sir Pattalot: As opposed to the end of the tutorial
[6:15:35 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Now that’s what I don’t like actually.
[6:16:03 PM] Sir Pattalot: Whats wrong with that system though?
[6:16:16 PM] Sir Pattalot: Only if you’ve already put a character through there can you skip it
[6:16:30 PM] Sir Pattalot: If its your first account you have to do the tutorial
[6:18:47 PM] Sir Pattalot: It wont be like that
[6:21:32 PM] Sir Pattalot: But why would some random just come and say
[6:21:44 PM] Sir Pattalot: Come you need to know the laws of the land before you come
[6:22:40 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Well, our character doesn’t know who the heck Sir Amak Varze is until they start Black Knights’ Fortress
[6:23:00 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Who the heck is this injured man when they start RS
[6:23:12 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Who the heck was The Runescape Guide in old rs
[6:23:26 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But the player later understands who they are
[6:23:28 PM] Arham Siddiqui: there purpose
[6:23:31 PM] Arham Siddiqui: about there life
[6:24:37 PM] Arham Siddiqui: But in my aspect, it’s still [size=14pt]originality[/size].
[6:24:46 PM] Arham Siddiqui: It’s [size=14pt]not[/size] making the game a whole new game
[6:25:13 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Its [size=14pt]keeping point of views[/size] of the [size=14pt]past[/size] game, but [size=14pt]implement[/size] [size=14pt]future[/size] tenses for [size=14pt]fun and uniqueness[/size]

Whatever that is bold are the key aspects of this server.

I believe this is all that is needed to understand.

MEDIA

[hr]

[size=36pt]The
Glory
Hog (AKA New Update)[/size]

[hr]

[size=36pt]Other
Updates[/size]

[hr]

The base will be Project Zeta. Why? Because this emphasizes using beginner bases and stepping on to more advance programming as you move on. Unlike let’s say XenoRune.

Delta_: For Delta.
Moparscape: Awesome forums!
Arham 4: Adding things to server
Project Zeta: An amazing base.

Read full topic
item.source: Realm Onwards - But with a twist... - Delta Version - Update: 2/? of Tutorial!
